So, 1 minute is 60 seconds, so:

Kimi: 1:19.886 = 61 + 19.886 seconds ≈ 80.886 seconds.

Michael Schumacher: 1:20.260 = 61 + 20.26 ≈ 81.26 seconds.

So Kimi is faster because his time is less than Michael's. So Michael has a slower Q1 time.

Wait no, wait. Wait, Michael's time is 1:20.260, which is higher (slower) than Kimi and Alonso.
